text: Pablo Arturo Metlich Ruíz (born 2 September 1978 in Gómez Palacio, Durango, México) is a former Mexican footballer, who last played as a midfielder for Atlético San Luis. Metlich made his professional debut with Tecos in 2002. He is of partial Serbian descent. ==External links== * * * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Durango Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga MX players Category:Tecos F.C. footballers Category:Lobos BUAP footballers Category:Indios de Ciudad Juárez footballers Category:C.D. title: Pablo Metlich
